```{r}
dataset <- read.csv("./datasets/BigMartTrain.csv")
```

```{r}
summary(dataset)
```

```{r}
hist(dataset$Item_Outlet_Sales)
hist(dataset$Item_Outlet_Sales, breaks = 100)
```

```{r}
out_norm <- dataset$Item_Outlet_Sales / length(dataset$Item_Outlet_Sales)
hist(out_norm)
```

```{r}
hist(log(dataset$Item_Outlet_Sales), breaks = 100)
```

```{r}
hist(sqrt(dataset$Item_Outlet_Sales), breaks = 100)
```

```{r}
hist(sqrt(out_norm), breaks = 100)
```
